rulelist.rule: Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach.
and. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

rule.reminder: It can attack this turn.

rulelist.rule: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
als 4 damage to each creature.

rule.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

rulelist.rule: Flying

rule.reminder: The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.

rulelist.rule: {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp.
Flying
Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

rule.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

rulelist.rule: Flying

rule.reminder: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

rulelist.rule: First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you don't, tap Yawgmoth Demon and it deals 2 damage to you.
{1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

rule.reminder: This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.

rulelist.rule: Forestwalk
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
